arts.ttl: Club considering whether to sign Crystal Palace or Norwich City player
arts.sum: Tyrick Mitchell has been a regular for Crystal Palace this season and Jose Cordoba has been an important part of Norwich City’s backline in the Championship in the current campaign. The Englishman has played 17 times in all competitions for the Eagles, operating at left wing-back under Oliver Glasner.
